headline: Kroger Plans to Name an Ex-Walmart Executive as Its Next CEO
summary: Greg Foran would steer the big grocer as it deals with cash-strapped shoppers and seeks to expand its footprint.

headline: Do These 3 Checks Before Buying The Kroger Co. (NYSE:KR) For Its Upcoming Dividend
summary: The Kroger Co. ( NYSE:KR ) is about to trade ex-dividend in the next 4 days. The ex-dividend date is one business day...
